tagline: Smart Education Loans for Global Dreams
mission: We help students achieve their study abroad dreams by connecting them with the right education loan providers through AI-powered matching.

what_we_do.overview: We are an education loan platform that connects students with NBFCs (Non-Banking Financial Companies) for study abroad loans. Our AI technology analyzes student profiles and matches them with lenders most likely to approve their applications.
key_features: AI-powered NBFC matching that finds the best lenders for your profile
Complete digital application process - no paperwork hassles
Expert consultant support throughout your journey
Real-time application tracking and status updates

why_choose_us.title: Smart AI Matching
why_choose_us.description: Our AI analyzes 50+ data points to match you with NBFCs that suit your profile, increasing approval chances by 3x

why_choose_us.title: Save Time & Effort
why_choose_us.description: Complete your application in 30 minutes instead of weeks of paperwork and running around

why_choose_us.title: Expert Guidance
why_choose_us.description: Get personalized support from education loan consultants who understand international education

why_choose_us.title: Transparent Process
why_choose_us.description: Know exactly where your application stands with real-time tracking and notifications

why_choose_us.title: Higher Approval Rates
why_choose_us.description: Our students have 85% approval rate compared to 45% industry average

target_audience: Students planning to study abroad, particularly from India seeking education loans for universities in USA, UK, Canada, Australia, and Europe
